Container.Name: bytemark-smtp
Container.Overview:
This image allows linked containers to send outgoing email. You can configure it to send email directly to recipients, or to act as a smart host that relays mail to an intermediate server (eg, GMail, SendGrid). The default installation is the smart host version, for additional parameters to use as a smart host see the project link.
https://hub.docker.com/r/bytemark/smtp/
Container.DonateText: If you found this useful feel free to drop a tip here
